item.title: Install and Tuning Java Applications running on VMware server - Upwork
item.description:
We hava a Web application programed by java ee connected to oracle Database and published on wildfly server "joboos server ", We face a problem that application server always hanging , and we must to restart the wildfly server services.
Probably we have a memory leaking wrong configuration.
We need some one to do for us the best tuning for Java applications server .
We have a good Infrastructure is :
Cpu: 2× Intel Xeon Silver4214 (24c/48t)
Ram: 384GB
Network 10G.
Storge : NVME
Os: VMWARE Vsphere 6.7.

We need to fix our problem by in one of this way :
1- Try to solve current server fix the problem ,and do test for 10K current connection.
2- create a new servers and installation for wildfly server with high availability with tuning for 10K current connection.


Posted On: April 13, 2021 21:10 UTC
Category: Virtual/Administrative Assistance
Skills:Java, Java EE, WildFly, Oracle WebLogic Server, Apache Tomcat, Servlet, Kerberos, Oracle Database, SQL, JPA, Oracle Java EE, JBoss, VMware ESX Server, VMWare, vSphere
Country: Turkey
click to apply

item.title: Integration Expert - Upwork
item.description:
Jitterbit Integration Expert

This job needs cross-team collaboration
• Responsible for all integrations and project activities.
• Ability to work with functional departments, reports and conversion. Good project management skillsets.
• Enhance current processes
• Analyze business requirements to determine integration solutions across various types of integrations; documentation of requirements, solutions and impacts, alternatives, and final decisions

Basic Qualifications:
• Jitterbit Integrations experience required (Min 3 years of hands-on experience)
• Experience in multiple iPaaS integration's


Posted On: April 12, 2021 21:30 UTC
Category: Solutions Architecture
Skills:Jitterbit, Oracle Database, Oracle PLSQL, APEX, SQL, API, Web Services, Java EE, HL7, ASC X12
Country: United States
click to apply
